title: Love in Han Yuan
overview:
Lu Han Zhi's fate is intertwined between two men from opposing sides of a
 war. Gao Chen who appears to be a traitor to his country is actually a 
Communist spy. Han Shou Min who appears to be a patriot and used to be a
 top spy of the Kuomindang is treading on
 a path of no return after being betrayed by his own comrades. Caught in
 a dangerous and increasingly complication situation, Lu Han Zhi grows 
from a mere socialite to an impassioned revolutionary.
